entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shoal Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shoal Lake 04:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -32.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -35.3°C
Wind: NW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 40 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
